list.description: An epic fantasy/adventure based on the popular video game series.
A continuation of the saga created by George Lucas and set thirty years after Sutâ wôzu/Jedai no fukushuu(1983).
In the 1820s, a frontiersman, Hugh Glass, sets out on a path of vengeance against those who left him for dead after a bear mauling.
Fearing the actions of a god-like Super Hero left unchecked, Gotham City's own formidable, forceful vigilante takes on Metropolis' most revered...
